H0.text: what two continents is turkey on. Europe

H1.text: what two continents is turkey on. Africa

H2.text: what two continents is turkey on. Europe and Africa

H3.text: what two continents is turkey on. Asia

A4.text: Turkey's Asian side covers 97% of its surface, and is often called Anatolia.

A5.text: Turkey is a country mainly located in Anatolia in West Asia, with a relatively small part called East Thrace in Southeast Europe.
